name: Ulyesses ADAMS, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH COURT OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent

parties: Ulyesses ADAMS, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH COURT OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of May, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
44 A.3d 655
Ulyesses ADAMS, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH COURT OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent.
No. 29 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 23, 2012.
